title: “The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations,
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Postal Money Order (No.4)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Postal Money Order (No.4) 

Regulations 2021.

title: “The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations,

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations unless the context otherwise requires: 

“The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations, 
2018 (S.I. No. 179 of 2018).

title: “The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations,
heading: 3. Schedule One of the No. 3 Regulations is hereby repealed and replaced
text_raw:
3. Schedule One of the No. 3 Regulations is hereby repealed and replaced 

with Schedule One of these Regulations. 

These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1ST day of June
text_norm: 3 schedule one no 3 regulation hereby repealed replaced schedule one regulation regulation shall come operation 1st day june

title: “The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations,

text_raw:
2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th April, 2021.

title: “The No. 3 Regulations” means the Postal Money Order (No. 3) Regulations,
heading: (This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Scheme provides for an increase in the charges for the issue of Postal 
Money Orders and takes effect on the 1st June 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [187]
